sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import Box from '@mui/material/Box';
import Container from '@mui/material/Container';
import Typography from '@mui/material/Typography';
import Button from '@mui/material/Button';

function SelectExercises() {

  const exercises = {
    push: [
        { title: 'Dumbell Press' },
        { title: 'Inclined Dumbell Press' },
        { title: 'Declined Dumbell Press' },
        { title: 'Bench Press' },
        { title: 'Inclined Bench Press' },
        { title: 'Declined Bench press' },
        { title: 'Dumbell flies' },
        { title: 'Inclined Dumbell Flies' },
        { title: 'Declined Dumbell Flies' },
        { title: 'Cable flies' },
        { title: 'Dumbell Military Press' },
        { title: 'Barbell Military Press' },
        { title: 'Dumbell front rise' },
        { title: 'Lateral Flies' },
        { title: 'Rope Triceps Pushdown' },
        { title: 'Barbell Triceps Pushdown' },
        { title: 'Cable Overhead Triceps Extensions' },
        { title: 'Overhead Triceps Extensions' },
        { title: 'Triceps Kickbacks' },
        { title: 'Dips' },
        { title: 'Skullcrushers' }
    ],
    pull: [
        { title: 'Dumbell Posterior Fly ' },
        { title: 'Cable row' },
        { title: 'Machine Row' },
        { title: 'Incline Machine Row' },
        { title: 'Dumbell Row' },
        { title: 'Inclined Dumbell Row' },
        { title: 'Barbell Row' },
        { title: 'Lat Pulldown' },
        { title: 'Pull Ups' },
        { title: 'Dumbell Biceps Curl' },
        { title: 'Barbell Biceps Curl' },
        { title: 'W Dumbell Biceps Curl' },
        { title: 'W Barbell Biceps Curl' },
        { title: 'Hammer Bicep Curl' }
    ],
    legs: [
        { title: 'Squats' },
        { title: 'Quad Extension' },
        { title: 'Leg Press Machine' },
        { title: 'Hack Squat' },
        { title: 'Bulgarian split squat' },
        { title: 'Hip Thrust' },
        { title: 'Deadlift' },
        { title: 'Sumo Deadlift' },
        { title: 'Romanian Deadlift' },
        { title: 'Hamstrings curl machine' }
    ]};

  const exercisesString = JSON.stringify(exercises);
  
  const pushExercises = exercisesString.filter(movement =>  {
    return movement === 'push'});

  return (
    <>
    <Container maxWidth="1600" 
    sx={{
      display: 'flex',
      flexDirection: 'column',
      height: '100vh',
    }}>
      <Box sx={{ 
        padding: '1em',
        display: 'flex',
      flexDirection: 'column',
      alignItems: 'center',
      width: 'auto'
        }}>
          <Typography sx={{ 
            fontFamily: 'Shadows Into Light, cursive', 
            fontSize: '3em', 
            fontWeight: '400',
            marginTop: '1.5em',
            color: 'primary.dark',
            marginBottom: '0.5em',
            }}>
              Choose your exercises</Typography>
            <Box sx={{ 
            padding: '1em',
            display: 'flex',
          flexDirection: 'row',
          justifyContent: 'center',
          alignItems: 'center',
          width: 'auto'
            }}>
              <Typography>Push</Typography>
              <Box>{exercisesString.map(exercise => <Box sx={{backgroundColor: 'primary.light'}}>
                {exercise}</Box>)}</Box>
              <Typography>Pull</Typography>
              <Typography>Legs</Typography>
            </Box>
              <Box sx={{ padding: '1em',display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'row',
              justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', width: 'auto'
            }}>
          <Button variant="contained" sx={{  backgroundColor: 'primary.main', marginTop: '1em',
            fontFamily: 'Shadows Into Light, cursive', fontSize: '3em', 
            fontWeight: '500',width: '7em', borderRadius: '20px', marginRight: '1em'
            }}>Go Back</Button>
            <Button variant="contained" sx={{  backgroundColor: 'primary.main',marginTop: '1em',
            fontFamily: 'Shadows Into Light, cursive', fontSize: '3em', fontWeight: '500',
            width: '7em',borderRadius: '20px',marginRight: '1em'
            }}>Next</Button>
            </Box>
          </Box>
      </Container>
    </>
  )
}

export default SelectExercises
